Package org.openremote.entities.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncControllerCallback<T>
    Interface defining all asynchronous callbacks
    CommandSender
    Interface for components that can send commands to the controller
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorSensor  
    Command  
    CommandResponse
    Response object received from the controller after sending a command
    ControlCommand
    Defines a command used for communicating with the controller
    ControlCommandResponse
    Response object received from the controller after sending a control command
    ControllerError  
    ControllerInfo
    Contains information about a controller; this information can be used to recreate an instance of the controller
    CustomSensor
    A text based sensor that provides value mapping via states
    Device
    Represents a device which has a name, list of commands it supports and list of sensors it has available.
    DeviceInfo
    A simple wrapper around a device name (for future expansion of device metadata)
    LevelSensor
    An integer sensor that supports values in the range 0-100
    PanelInfoList
    List of panels available on a particular controller
    RangeSensor
    An integer sensor with a customisable min/max value range
    Sensor
    Abstract base class for all sensors
    SensorStatus
    Provides status information for a sensor
    SensorStatusList
    Provides list of sensor status information
    SwitchSensor
    A boolean sensor that has an ON/OFF state
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ControllerCommands
    List of Supported Controller Commands
    ControllerResponseCode
    Controller Response Codes TODO: These need fully defining on the controller REST API
    SensorType
    Sensor Type enum
